statements: SELECT * FROM customer_data WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customer_data WHERE customer_age > 30;
SELECT customer_name, customer_gender FROM customer_data ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM customer_data WHERE customer_age BETWEEN 25 AND 40;
SELECT customer_email FROM customer_data WHERE customer_gender = 'Female';
SELECT * FROM customer_data WHERE customer_age > 30 ORDER BY customer_name DESC, customer_age ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, customer_email FROM customer_data WHERE customer_gender = 'Male' ORDER BY customer_name
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customer_data WHERE LENGTH(customer_address) > 20
SELECT customer_name, customer_address FROM customer_data WHERE customer_age BETWEEN 25 AND 40 ORDER BY customer_name LIMIT 10
SELECT customer_name, customer_gender FROM customer_data WHERE customer_email LIKE '%gmail.com%'
SELECT customer_name, email_address, age FROM customers;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE segment = 'Regular';
SELECT customer_name, address FROM customers WHERE age < 30;
SELECT offer_name, discount, expiry_date FROM offers;
SELECT * FROM offers WHERE segment = 'Exclusive' ORDER BY expiry_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, age FROM customers WHERE segment = 'Premium';
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email_address FROM customers WHERE age BETWEEN 25 AND 40 AND segment = 'Regular' ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT customer_name, address FROM customers WHERE segment = 'Premium' AND age < 50;
SELECT offer_name, discount FROM offers WHERE expiry_date > '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers;
SELECT promotion_name, discount_percentage, start_date FROM promotions ORDER BY promotion_id DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email, age, gender FROM customers WHERE age > 30;
SELECT product_name, amount, purchase_date FROM purchases WHERE amount > 100 ORDER BY purchase_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE gender = 'Female' ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_id, product_name, amount, purchase_date FROM purchases WHERE amount > 100 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM promotions WHERE end_date >= '2022-12-31' ORDER BY start_date ASC;
SELECT promotion_name, discount_percentage, start_date, end_date FROM promotions WHERE discount_percentage > 10 ORDER BY discount_percentage DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE dob >= '1990-01-01';
SELECT customer_id, address FROM customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%';
SELECT * FROM products WHERE stock_quantity > 0 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT product_name, description, price FROM products WHERE price < 50 AND stock_quantity >= 10;
SELECT * FROM customers
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name FROM customers WHERE dob > '1990-01-01' ORDER BY last_name ASC
SELECT product_id, product_name, price FROM products WHERE stock_quantity > 0 ORDER BY price DESC

SELECT c.first_name, c.last_name, p.product_name, pr.discount FROM customers c JOIN purchases pu ON c.customer_id = pu.customer_id JOIN products p ON pu.product_id = p.product_id JOIN promotions pr ON pr.product_id = p.product_id WHERE pr.start_date < '2022-01-01' AND pr.end_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT SUM(total_price) AS revenue, DATE_TRUNC('month', purchase_date) AS month FROM purchases GROUP BY date_trunc('month', purchase_date) ORDER BY month ASC
SELECT * FROM Customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM Customers;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM Products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT customer_name, age FROM Customers WHERE age > 30;
SELECT customer_name, product_name, interaction_date FROM Customers JOIN Interactions ON Customers.customer_id = Interactions.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM Customers;
SELECT customer_name, age, address FROM Customers WHERE age > 30;

SELECT customer_name, product_name, category, price FROM Customers JOIN Subscriptions ON Customers.customer_id = Subscriptions.customer_id JOIN Products ON Subscriptions.product_id = Products.product_id;
SELECT customer_name, order_date, total_amount FROM Customers INNER JOIN Orders ON Customers.customer_id = Orders.customer_id WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT interaction_date, interaction_type FROM Interactions ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
